name: kubetail
description: Kubetail is a tool for tailing logs from multiple Kubernetes pods at once. It aggregates logs in a single stream, easing debugging in distributed systems, and is typically used as a CLI in terminal workflows.

features.title: Kubernetes Ready
features.description: Tail logs from multiple Kubernetes pods simultaneously. Debug distributed applications efficiently

features.title: Single Stream
features.description: Aggregate logs into unified stream with pod identification. See all logs in one view

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: Live log streaming as new entries are written. Monitor applications in real-time

features.title: Pod Selection
features.description: Select pods by name, label selector, or deployment. Target specific workloads

features.title: Namespace Filtering
features.description: Filter logs by Kubernetes namespace. Focus on relevant applications

features.title: Color Coding
features.description: Distinguish pods with color-coded output. Identify log sources quickly

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search log content and filter by patterns. Find specific log entries

features.title: Container Selection
features.description: Choose specific containers within pods to tail. Narrow focus to relevant logs
